description: As unrest continues in Haiti, many American families seeking to adopt Haitian children are unable to complete the adoption process and are facing multiple roadblocks. NBC News’ Fredlyn Pierre Louis spoke to parents worried that their children could be stuck in Haiti as the country continues to experience political chaos.
title: Parents hoping to adopt children from Haiti are met with challenges and roadblocks

description: The families of rescued Israeli hostages described the psychological abuse and physical punishment they endured in Hamas captivity before the raid to free them from Gaza.
title: Families of freed hostages detail their rescue — and the ordeal they faced in Hamas captivity

description: President Biden and the G7 leaders have agreed to provide Ukraine with a $50 billion loan, essentially drawn from frozen Russian assets. The funds are designated for military aid, humanitarian support and reconstruction. NBC News' Monica Alba reports on the details of the G7 summit and the loan for Ukraine.
title: What Biden hopes to achieve with the Ukraine security deal

description: Travis Melis, from Portland, Oreg., told an NBC News team in Gaza what he saw at Al-Aqsa Hospital as Israel's rescue operation unfolded. "As people died, they were taken away and their spaces were immediately filled," he said.
title: Gaza hospital eyewitness tells NBC News about victims of Israel's hostage rescue

description: Volunteers with the humanitarian aid organization Doctor Without Borders told NBC News about the many ways in which Sudan's civil war was creating hunger and preventing aid from reaching those who need it.
title: Sudan's civil war causes humanitarian catastrophe through conflict and aid disruptions

description: BARI, Italy — President Joe Biden is expected to meet with Pope Francis privately Friday on the sidelines of the G7 summit in Italy, according to a senior administration official.
title: Biden to hold a private meeting with Pope Francis on sidelines of G7 summit

description: A man died after he was electrocuted in a hot tub at a Mexican resort, local officials announced Wednesday.
title: Texas man dies after being electrocuted in hot tub at Mexican resort

description: After an Israeli airstrike killed a senior Hezbollah commander, the group responded by firing hundreds of missiles and drones into Israel. Matt Bradley reports on why this cross-border escalation is reigniting fears of war with Hezbollah.
title: Hezbollah-Israel border clashes intensify

description: El Salvador's president is showing no signs of slowing his crackdown on gangs as he begins his second term in office. The government released clips and photos of a massive operation that put thousands of suspected criminals behind bars in the country's "mega prison."
title: How El Salvador transferred 2,000 inmates to a 'mega prison'

description: An AI candidate is running for parliament in the United Kingdom. AI Steve is an avatar of a real-life businessman Steven Endacott. Steve is running for Parliament as an Independent.
title: AI candidate 'Steve' runs for UK parliament
